Mattias, that's a good question for comparison.  Because it is a 
challenge=
 to affect the holistic policy of a neural network with a 
single input, I =
am guessing it would not work as well.  In contrast, 
in HyperNEAT, the x p=
osition naturally has a holistic effect on the 
substrate because the whole=
 substrate is generated from that value.  
Yet it is an empirical issue and=
 I could be wrong; your idea might 
work as well.

ken

oups.com, "Mattias Fagerlund" <mattias@...> wrote:
